name: Super Nanaru
description:
Super Nanaru is a cute and pixel art concept.
A hardcore side-scrolling jumping platformer game.
Test the limits of the player
Obtain and use skins with various abilities
Defeat all bosses with strong power
Bring back all the bread!

name: TallyUP
description:
TallyUP is a free Play-To-Earn game designed for everyone.

TallyUP redistributes a large % of its ad revenue to its players as a small but real financial stake. Players are then allowed to play simple and addictive minigames to try to win bigger and bigger amounts of prizes.

The game is free to play with no ways to deposit or risk a player's own money. All winnings are shared with charity (10% minimum, but you can always choose to give more).

name: Obgoose
description: Do you despise playing scrabble with others? The feeling that everyone knows more words than you? Well, now this time is over. Obgoose is a single-player non-competitive scrabble-like game where no one will ever know when you are obtuse.

name: Make the Jump
description: This is a 3D first person hardcore jumping game, where your enemy is time! Try to complete all three levels and get a trophy!

name: Humanities Legend: Hollow Ascending
description: A challenging yet forgiving souls-like action adventure. Parry, block, and dodge enemy attacks while exploring a ruined fort. Discover rich lore and epic boss fights.

name: Do Not Open
description: Survival horror game Do Not Open is a mix of escape room elements, plus it's said to be based entirely on true events. You're playing for Michael J. Goreng, "a well-known zoologist and epidemiologist imprisoned in his own home, where his wife and daughter are held against their will".

name: Genpei Kassen
description: Genpei Kassen is a historical simulation game which focuses on the war between the Genji (Minamoto clan) and the Heike (Taira clan) at the end of Japan's Heian period (12th century).

name: Metropolis Origins
description:
Metropolis Origins is an NFT collectible card game set in a cyberpunk world.

When the Big Lift took the best of humanity to the stars, the old world ended and a new one formed out of street tech and sheer hustle: Metropolis.

Build your deck, choosing from Government, Corporate or Underground factions, and play against an AI or other players from around the world. Use muscle, cunning, or hacking skills to make your way up from the dark alleys to the bright lights of Metropolis. Just don't lose.

Metropolis Origins is a ransom note from the future and a supercharged vision of the present. Created by QXR Studios.

Quit your job to become an indie developer and make your first game!

How will your game do when it releases?

name: Tetragun
description: Tetragun is a top-down shooter where you play as a stationary turret and defend yourself against waves of enemies. As you progress through the waves, you will acquire upgrades to help you keep up with the growing strength and numbers of your enemies. The arena is split into 4 quadrants, and your turret will only be able to aim within the confines of the quadrant it is currently in. To aim at enemies outside of your current quadrant, you'll need to enter rotate mode with RMB and click on the quadrant you would like to rotate to. The goal of the game is to make it as far as possible, and get the highest score you can.

name: Merc Tactics
description:
Merc Tactics is a top-down tactical turn-based RPG in which you engage in epic tactical shootouts.
The game takes place in a region where civil war has left the country in chaos. The Khondo, a vicious band of looting militia have taken control of the country. You lead a small squad of mercenaries, who have vowed to restore order and rid the country of the Khondo.

You need to carefully plot your way through the region, recruiting mercenaries, upgrading your skills procuring armour and weapons and forming alliances with friendly militia. Each location in the campaign map hosts hostile militia, which you must fight in turn-based squad combat.

When your squad is strong enough you can confront the ringleader militia, but it will not be easy.

Nearly everything in the game is randomly generated, including the campaign map, enemy and resource locations. Scene layout and buildings are procedurally generated, leading to a huge variety of different scenes which your squad has to fight through.

description:
Are all first loves this bittersweet?

Quiet, shy and anxious, confessing to your crush takes every ounce of your courage. And when it all goes wrong, the last space left that is safe is the roof. But when a kind hand offers a carton of lemonade, how will your paths collide?

name: Rain and Red Roses
description:
The Year Is 1968. Trying to sleep amid academic pressure, pretending to be alright, and a raging thunderstorm outside of your dorm room, all you have to do is get in bed and get some rest. If only your dreams would cooperate...

Rain And Red Roses is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. It primarily uses Alice in Wonderland as its theme mixed with 1960's aesthetic. The goal is to explore and collect effects, with the option to collect four counts of red paint as well, which unlocks a different ending.

description: HellKid is at its core a conventional 2D side-scrolling platform game, but with a lot of added twists and features. As Devi, your objective is to collect enough souls in your quest to become human! Souls come in various colors such as golden and blue, and each of the 12 levels in "Valley of Soul" with increasing difficulty contains more than 50 patterns to master.

name: Stay?
description:
Choose your own happy ending.

Welcome to Elaia, a magical city nestled in a high valley. It's the end of your first year at university & time to choose your major. Find yourself among potential friends or lovers—young people with secrets, dreams, fears, and tragedies. Learn about the history & breadth of Elaia's world, and decide what kind of mark you want to leave on it.

Here's the best, smol and adorable shark! Gawr Gura!!!
She's from the mysterious deep sea city Atlantis. However the people can't find the city anymore. Gura decided to take an adventure! Help her to eat some food, beat the bad guys and find Atlantis! Maybe something still left there then Gura can keep it safe...

name: Dragon King: The Fighting Game
description:
Dragon King: The Fighting Game was an unfinished low budget 3D fighting game, and was the first in a planned series of fighting video games. The game was developed for the Nintendo 64, where it was to make unique use of the joystick on the controller. After deciding to use Nintendo characters to give it a more proper atmosphere on the Nintendo 64, the game later became Super Smash Bros.

In 2022, Masahiro Sakurai presented in his own YouTube Channel some footage of the game, with the official title localization of "Dragon King: The Fighting Game".

name: Ashes: 2063 - Enriched Edition

Experience the realistic pool dynamics and make magical trick shots. Utilize the card collectible system and improve your decks over time. Battle it out with your friends anytime and anywhere!

name: Touhou Mother
description: Touhou Mother is a Touhou Project and EarthBound cross-over parody RPG game. It stars Reimu Hakurei, Marisa Kirisame, Yuuka Kazami and Mima and features many Touhou characters from the PC-98 and Windows canon, along with several characters from the Mother series and a few fan-made characters. The majority of the outside influence and references comes from EarthBound, but other notorious video games are paid homage as well.

name: Bludgeons & Krakens
description:
Bludgeons & Krakens is a turn-based, open world RPG in which the player must seek out and destroy, or outwit, the seven Beasts of Destruction threatening the land of Abraxas.

Keep It Classy (Or Don't). Build your character from one of five classes: Fighter, Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, or Druid. Play to the strengths of your class or define your own style through mastering weapon skills and magic abilities.
Explore a Strange World. Quests and secrets abound in every corner of Abraxas. Engage in a variety of side quests with multiple endings, or simply wander the land in search of your fortune.
Loot the Bodies. Take on hordes of foes in turn-based combat. Sling spells, quaff potions, rend your enemies, and reap the glorious rewards. When your skills are honed, seek out powerful bosses who will truly challenge your abilities.
